pr_title: Flink: add maxParallelism method to method chain in flink RewriteDataFilesAction

timeline.message: add maxParallelism method to method chain

timeline.bodyText: Would it make sense to also add setMaxParallelism in addition to this to match the Flink API?
timeline.author: kbendick

replies.bodyText: I think it's OK to use maxParallelism(..)  because the base class BaseRewriteDataFilesAction also have the setter method without the prefix set.
replies.author: openinx
